resource_section: Tourists arrivals by country of residence and month (All Countries) 2020
remarks: Dataset contains tourist arrival statistics by month for 2020, showing the total number of arrivals for each month. Columns: Month and Arrivals. Data shows arrivals primarily in the first three months (January: 228,434; February: 207,507; March: 71,370), with zero arrivals from April to November, and minimal arrivals in December (393), reflecting the impact of COVID-19 travel restrictions.
